description: A crispy potato topping adds a delicious twist to this vegan cottage pie.
keywords: Shepherd's & cottage pie,Low saturated fat,High protein,Low salt,Tomato,Low sugar,Low fat,Potato,Mushroom
name: Lentil Hotpot Cottage Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.8 cup vegetable stock, hot, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half of the oil in a large, non-stick pan on medium heat and cook the onions and carrots for 5 minutes, stirring. Stir in the garlic, rosemary and mushrooms and cook for 6-8 minutes. Add the flour and cook for 1 minute.
Stir in the chopped tomatoes, stock and lentils and partially cover with the lid. Bring to the boil, reduce the heat and simmer for 15 minutes until reduced and thick.
Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Pour the mushroom mix into an ovenproof dish, arrange the potato slices on top, brush with oil and bake for 40 minutes, until golden and bubbling.
